entry.name: AllianceHint
entry.value: An alliance lasts at least 10 turns and allows both factions to enter each other's territory and fight side by side.

entry.name: DenounceHint
entry.value: Public accusations that decrease the standing of the denounced faction with your friends but increase the faction's standing with your rivals. If denied, the impact is lessened.

entry.name: GiftHint
entry.value: A financial gift that, if accepted, increases the standing of the donor with the receiver.

entry.name: NonAggressionPactHint
entry.value: A non-aggression pact prevents both factions from declaring war on each other. Terminating this pact results in a significant standing loss with the other faction and, to a lesser degree, all other factions who know either of the two former pact partners.

entry.name: OpenBordersHint
entry.value: Allows both factions to enter each other's territory.

entry.name: PeaceOfferToThirdPartyHint
entry.value: Demands from the dialogue partner to offer peace to a third party. If both partners are in an alliance, refusing to offer peace results in a standing loss with the ally.

entry.name: PraiseHint
entry.value: Public words of praise that, if accepted, increase the standing of the praised faction with your friends but decrease the faction's standing with your rivals.

entry.name: ResearchPactHint
entry.value: A research pact grants a bonus of up to 10% (based on its duration) of a faction's total research per turn to the partner. Thus, the faction with the lower research per turn profits more from the pact.

entry.name: ShareMapHint
entry.value: Both factions share their explored territories, but the fog of war is not revealed.

entry.name: TradingPactHint
entry.value: A trading pact grants a bonus of up to 10% (based on its duration) of a faction's total income per turn to the partner. Thus, the faction with the lower income per turn profits more from the pact.

entry.name: TributeHint
entry.value: A reflection of the power balance between two factions, demanding or refusing tribute harms relations between the involved factions.

entry.name: WarHint
entry.value: A war drastically decreases the standing between two factions and allows each party to enter the enemy's territory, attack their units and capture cities.

entry.name: WarDeclarationOnThirdPartyHint
entry.value: Demands from the dialogue partner to declare war on a third party. If both partners are in an alliance, refusing to declare war results in a standing loss with the ally.
